ComicInfo.Summary:
Ember has hired the Lookers to find her hacker, perhaps without sharing all the fine details. Tanya and Michelle are figuring this out on the fly as the bullets whiz past! From webcam girls to super spies, this will be a crazy ride from writer Pat Shand and artist Gabriel Andrade! But this ongoing series gets better - each issue has an Ember solo story as well, written and drawn by Christian Zanier! Available with these sexy covers: Regular, Red Hot, Undercover, Undercover Bikini, and Wraparound by Christian Zanier, Workout and GGA Homage by Renato Camilo, Sexy Spies by Raulo Caceres, and Luscious by Matt Martin.
For the erotic cover art collectors we offer: Nude, Adult, Red Hot Nude, Undercover Topless, Undercover Nude, Undercover Adult, Undercover Adult Extreme , Wraparound Nude, Threesome Adult, Threesome Adult Extreme by Christian Zanier, Workout Nude and GGA Homage Nude by Renato Camilo, Sexy Spies Nude by Raulo Caceres, and Luscious Nude, Luscious Adult by Matt Martin.
